root.name: Prison Break: The Conspiracy
root.description: OverviewPrison Break: The Conspiracy was supposed to be published during the run of Prison Break by Brash Entertainment, but the game was cancelled when the publisher went out of business in November 2008.Despite not having a publisher; developer ZootFly continued development of Prison Break, and in May 2009 announced that they had signed a deal with Deep Silver to release the game. It was released on the PC, Xbox 360, and PlayStation 3 in March 2010.StoryThe game takes place from the point of view of an agent for "the Company" named Tom Paxton whose role is to observe and prevent the escape of Michael Scofield and Lincoln Burrows from Fox River State Penitentiary.
